description.en:
A Spinoff of <Castle 2: Pinnacle> - An action drama featuring Saroka 'Seo Jintae'!

Jintae becomes a killer after being saved by a man when he was at life's lowest point. While searching for his long-lost sister, he discovers that his younger sister is in Hong Kong and deeply involved with the Triad, Hong Kong's largest criminal organization. Thus begins Jintae's journey as he confronts the Triad in the nighttime streets of Hong Kong while searching for his sister.
description.ko:
<캐슬2:만인지상> 사로카 '서진태'의 액션활극!
삶의 끝자락에서 한 남자에게 구원을 받고 킬러가 된 서진태.
어렸을 적 헤어진 동생을 찾기 위해 수소문하던 중 동생이 홍콩에 있다는 것과
홍콩 최대의 범죄조직 삼합회와 깊게 관련되어 있다는 사실을 알게 된다.
그렇게 서진태는 밤의 도시 홍콩에서 삼합회와 맞서며 동생을 찾아 나서는데...

title.en: Sore wa Rei no Shiwaza desu

altTitles.en: It's the work of the Ghost

altTitles.ja: それは霊のしわざです

altTitles.th: รักนี้ผีจัดให้

description.en: My name is Torii Nozomu, a plain introvert. Suddenly a new transfer student, Kirishima Kyoko, sits next to me. She's cute, kind, and for some reason she proactively talks to me, even though I'm a nerd! A true saint. Yet I want to get involved with her as little as possible because she's haunted by a "ghost" that only I can see! She's a little naughty, extremely pure and, in some cases, horrifying! Will I ever find a way to handle her?
description.fr: Je m'appelle Torii Nozomi. Un jour, une nouvelle fille est arrivée dans ma classe. Elle est très jolie, mais le problème c'est qu'elle est suivie par un fantôme (très taquin) que je suis le seul à voir !
description.ja: 地味で目立たない陰キャな僕、鳥居望(とりいのぞむ)。そんな僕の隣に席に転校生の霧島京子(きりしまきょうこ）ちゃんがやってきた。可愛くて優しくて、なぜか陰キャな僕にも積極的に話しかけてくれる「ぐう聖」な京子ちゃん！…だけど僕はなるべく彼女にかかわりたくない。だって、彼女には僕にだけ見える“霊”が憑いてるんだ！！！！――ちょっとエッチで、とびきりピュアで、ところによりホラー！？

A playboy goes after an innocent-seeming girl, having no idea what he's getting into.

description.en:
5 years ago, in an event known as ‘The Day of Loss’, magic ceased to function. In the underground land of Alefgard, the people of the kingdom of Radatome vanished in a single night. The only survivors are Aros, the prince of the kingdom, and A-Kagi, a member of a group of bandits known as the Band of the Hawks, who infiltrated the castle that night to commit a robbery.  
Aros, who becomes an amnesiac due to trauma, is raised in the care of A-Kagi and the Band of the Hawks. Years later, events lead him to depart from the Hawks and begin seeking out the truth behind "the Day of Loss" – as well as the whereabouts of his missing twin sister, who appears to be stealing sacred crystal orbs on the orders of a young boy who calls himself "Lamia."  
Meanwhile, the companions of the hero Arus have been systematically eliminated by unknown parties…

altTitles.ja: ナノ魔神

description.en:
After being held in disdain and having his life put in danger, an orphan from the Demonic Cult, Cheon Yeo-Woon, has an unexpected visit from his descendant from the future who inserts a nano machine into Cheon Yeo-Woon's body, which drastically changes Cheon Yeo-Woon's life after its activation. The story of Cheon Yeo-Woon's journey of bypassing the Demonic Cult and rising to become the best martial artist has just begun.

Setelah mengalami cobaan berat pada hidupnya, Tiba tiba Chun yeowun mendapatkan pertolongan tidak terduga dari keturunannya di masa depan yang memasukkan teknologi nano ke dalam tubuhnya! Mampukah Chun Yeowun menjadi master bela diri dengan menggunakan kekuatan nano mashin!?

「未来の力を手に入れ、邪悪な魔教に立ち向かう！」 魔教の私生児として生まれた主人公・天黎雲。 幼い頃から卑しまれ、後継者争いで命を狙われる。 死に物狂いの抵抗もむなしく、危うく命を落としかねない絶体絶命のピンチに･･･！ その瞬間、突如現れた謎の男から「ナノマシン」と呼ばれる未来の力を注入され、 目覚めるととてつもない力を手に入れていた。 魔教を超え、最強の武人を目指す天黎雲の物語が幕を開ける！

갖은 멸시와 목숨의 위협을 받던 마교의 사생아 천여운, 
미래에서 나타난 후손이 천여운의 몸에 나노 머신을 주입한 후 그의 인생이 송두리째 바뀐다.
마교를 넘어 무림 최고의 자리에 오르기 위한 천여운의 거침없는 이야기가 시작된다!

description.ru:
Чен Еун — незаконнорожденный принц, появившийся на свет без единой частички Нейгуна. С самого раннего детства он находился под гнетом всеобщего отвращения. Весь забитый, с отсутствием какой-либо мотивации, год за годом Еун влачил свое жалкое существование. Ни на что не рассчитывая... и не претендуя.

Будучи изгоем, исконно презираемым шестью великими кланами, в один прекрасный день он оказался в окружении десятка подосланных убийц. Когда глаза практически застлала пелена белого света... и казалось, он уже начал теряться, проваливаясь в пучину... безграничного отчаяния, на горизонте возникла еле заметная фигура.

Неизвестный "потомок", снизошедший из будущего, в мгновение ока уничтожил всех врагов. Прошептав нечто невнятное, он подсадил в тело нашего героя какой-то странный предмет... наномашину. С этого момента все кардинально переменилось. Поселившийся где-то внутри искусственный интеллект дал его жизни невероятный толчок.

Больше не будет как прежде. Это... новая ветвь истории. Истории о парне, который бросил вызов небесам.

title.en: Tsuki no Oki ni Mesu mama

altTitles.ja: 月のお気に召すまま

altTitles.en: By the Whims of the Moon

description.en: In middle school, Ayumu kept getting teased and pranked by Runa, even though he's a year below her. Now that she's in her second year of high school, she's ready to be the experienced senpai for the incoming freshman Runa.
description.ja: 生意気な後輩男子にイジワルされまくり…でも、本当は好きの裏返し!?　歩は、ややポンコツな高2女子。新学期、歩の通う高校に、中学時代の後輩男子・月（るな）が入学してくる。月は、勉強も運動もデキて、早速モテモテ。彼氏ができない歩のことをバカにしてくるけど…!?
description.pt-br: No fundamental, Ayumu continuava sendo provocada por Runa, apesar de ele estar um ano abaixo dela. Agora que ela está no segundo ano do ensino médio, e está pronta para ser a Senpai experiente do calouro Runa.

title.en: My Younger Sister Was a Genius

altTitles.en: My Younger Sibling Was a Genius

description.en: Yoon Hajoon, who struggled to pursue his musical career despite his iffy talents and ended up sacrificing his own family along the way, " If only I could turn back time...! " One day, after living with regrets and alcohol for a while, he woke up and found himself had returned to the past. Just then, it dawned on him. The fact that my younger sister is a musical genius...! Now is the time to turn my life around, that is by producing my younger sister into becoming the best singer!

title.en: Danshi Kokoseidakedo Gyaru ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.ja: 男子高校生だけどギャルにTSしました

altTitles.ja-ro: Danshi Koukousei Dakedo Gal ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.en: I'm a High School Boy, but I Got Gender-Swapped into a Gyaru

altTitles.pt-br: Eu sou um Garoto do Ensino médio, mas troquei de Gênero e Me Tornei uma Gal

description.en:
Junpei, a loner high schooler, became a gyaru after saving the god of gyaru from drowning. Through his mother's connections, he was able to transfer to an all-girls school, but it was stuffed to the brim with gyarus! Every day is a sensory overload for Shunpei, who's never even talked to a girl, let alone a gyaru.
___
 [Alternative Official Raw (NicoNico)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67976)
description.ja: 陰キャ男子・桜井は、目の前で溺れていたギャル神様を助けた恩恵でギャルになってしまった。母親の伝手で転校することができたが、その学校はギャルだらけの女子校だった！ギャルどころか女子とまともに交流したことがない桜井にとって刺激が強すぎる毎日…。
description.pt-br:
Shunpei, um estudante solitário do ensino médio, se tornou uma gal depois de salvar a deusa das gals de se afogar. Através das conexões de sua mãe, ele conseguiu transferir-se para uma escola só para meninas, mas estava cheia de gals!
 Todos os dias são uma sobrecarga sensorial para Shunpei, que nunca falou com uma garota, muito menos com uma gal.
 
 É o início de uma comédia escolar engraçada, com um cara introvertido do ensino médio => transformado em Gal.

altTitles.ja: 見切りから始める我流剣術

description.en: Rio, a boy living in a remote village, attends the village dojo for self-defense, but gives up the idea that he cannot become stronger under the dojo’s teaching methods. However, the village is a dangerous place, and Rio decides to create his own way of fighting – “Garyu Kenjutsu” – in order to survive! A royal road fantasy of swords and magic is about to begin!

Even if a musician dies, he never dies. It's just covered. Singer-songwriter Kim Han-seok, who became a legend in Korea with just a guitar... Waking up as a college student in the streaming era 30 years after his death!

In the Immortal Realm, Jinyul was renowned as the Beauty Immortal, leading fashion trends and styles as the personal barber of the Jade Emperor. However, he, who was (literally) intoxicated by his high status, behaved recklessly and caused a major accident, completely shaving off the Jade Emperor’s hair. Enraged, the Jade Emperor banished him to the Mortal Realm. After falling into the Mortal Realm, Jinyul planned to regain his prowess and return to the Immortal Realm once again. But the moment he landed, things started going awry! Can Jinyul regain his status and return to his rightful place in the Immortal Realm?

altTitles.ja: 夢色パティシエール

description.en:
Amano Ichigo is a clumsy 14-year-old girl whose only "outstanding" trait is an incomparable love of sweets. Constantly overshadowed by her near genius-pianist little sister, Ichigo looked forward to a Sweets Festival to lift her spirits a bit; and lo and behold, a taste takes her by the tongue, leading her to Henri Lucas- a world-famous master patissier. She's not the only one enthralled; Henri is sure she's someone amazing, and gives her a recommendation to St. Marie Academy, a school famous for turning out master patissieres!  
  
No sooner than she transfers, Ichigo finds herself amongst the biggest big-shots of the entire middle school, and faced with more troubles than her klutzy self is quite ready to handle. But with the help of her "Sweets Spirit" Vanilla… who knows what'll be possible?

While working as a small supporting actor in a movie, Ki Man Sung has nothing else going for him.  
However, that was when ,through mysterious circumstance, the movie set had become reality during filming.  
With the sound of the director’s cut, during that short take, he’s not an actor but actually thrown into the events occurring, showing the pain and emotions he faces in that moment.  
He can only come back if he creates that perfect take…!  
Can he grow to become the greatest actor?
description.ko:
영화에 단역배우로 출연 중이지만, 이렇다 할 성과는 없는 기만성.
어느 날, 촬영 도중 영화가 현실이 되는 초자연적인 현상을 겪는다. 

감독의 컷 소리와 함께 그 순간 만큼은 배우가 아닌 실제 상황에 처한 인물이 되어 사랑을 하고, 아픔을 느끼며 더욱더 리얼한 연기를 펼치는 주인공.
최고의 한 컷을 만들어야만 현실로 돌아올 수 있다…!

과연 그는 최고의 배우로 성장할 수 있을까?
description.ru: Работа в качестве скромного актера второго плана в кино, это все что есть у Ки Ман Сона. Однако благодаря таинственным обстоятельствам, съемочная площадка стала реальностью во время съемок. Во время этого короткого дубля, он не просто актер, а фактически участник происходящих событий, чувствующий боль и эмоции которые происходят во круг него. Он может вернуться только если создаст идеальный дубль...! Сможет ли он стать величайшим актером?

description.de:
Da geht irgendwas sehr seltsames in der Nachbarschaft vor sich.  
Ja wen wirst du Bescheid sage? Wen willst du zur Hilfe holen? Ähm… irgendein komisches… Mädchen was von sich behauptet, hypnotische Kräfte zu besitzen? Ach so, ja, genau das.  
Jedoch hast du absolut keine Ahnung wo sie ist, und du hast ihr auch nicht Bescheid gegeben.  
Was wird nun aus dir werden, da er da ist…?
description.en:
There's something strange, in the neighborhood.  
Who you gonna call? Uhm. Some strange cute hypnotist girl.  
And you have no clue who she is, and you didn't call her.  
  


---
description.ru:
Каково это, когда привычный мир рушится в одночасье? Кто друг, а кто враг?
Можно ли доверять себе, когда сам теряешься в круговороте пугающих и необъяснимых событий? А может быть, ты сам и есть их источник?
Главный герой — обычный корейский парень, живущий с пожилой матерью в крохотной квартирке, обнаружил, что люди вокруг внезапно изменились. Некие зловещие существа без лишнего шума захватили целый город, а, возможно, даже страну или мир. Но главный герой не собирается сидеть сложа руки и, объединившись с загадочной гипнотизёршей, решает дать отпор неведомым тварям.

altTitles.ja: 電音部コミカライズ

description.en:
This is a story of girls who risk their youth!

Reina is a transfer student who came to Tokyo from Hokkaido.
Her reason coming to Tokyo is... 「EDM Club」, a club based on DJ activities!
But, the EDM Club that Reina dreamt about everyday is somehow not popular in her new school...?

In the near-future Tokyo, the girls' DJ battles are about to unfold!
A story driven by music, will now begin―
description.id:
Ini adalah cerita para gadis yang mempertaruhkan masa mudanya!

Reina adalah murid pindahan dari Hokkaido ke Tokyo.
Yang ingin ingin bangun di Tokyo adalah... 「EDM Club」, Eskul bertemakan DJ!
Namun, EDM Club yang tiap hari Reina dambakan ternyata tidak populer di sekolah pindahannya...?

Di Tokyo masa depan, DJ battle para gadis ini akan dimulai!
Ini lah, Cerita yang disatukan oleh musik―
description.ja:
これは、青春の全てをかける少女達の物語！

北海道からトウキョウへ転校してきた零奈。
彼女がトウキョウでやりたかったこと…それは、「電音部」でDJ活動をすること！
憧れの電音部での毎日を夢見る零奈だったが、転校先の外神田文芸高校では、電音部は人気がないらしく……？

近未来のトウキョウで、少女たちがDJバトルを繰り広げる！
音楽が紡いでくれた一つの物語が、いま始まる――

description.en: Lee Gijeok Physical Therapist. The center is failing, and my girlfriend is drifting away…! On a day when nothing goes right, after being hit by a falling star, a status window appears?! This is a story of a self-centered Man becoming the best physical therapist!

A place where you casually use blood or ma in your name, I lived in Murim for 7 years. I was miserable, and I did a lot of dirty things. But I had to do anything to survive. That's 'Nangin' Finally, I crossed the line and experienced death in a desire to become stronger. But when I opened my eyes, it was modern. The world has changed and we are connected to the fantasy world of Pangea?! And as a returner with the only class? Let's scratch the lottery tickets!
description.id: Tempat di mana Anda dengan santai menggunakan darah atau ma atas nama Anda, saya tinggal di Murim selama 7 tahun. Saya sengsara, dan saya melakukan banyak hal kotor. Tapi aku harus melakukan apapun untuk bertahan hidup. Itulah 'Nangin' Akhirnya, saya melewati batas dan mengalami kematian dalam keinginan untuk menjadi lebih kuat. Tapi ketika saya membuka mata saya, itu modern. Dunia telah berubah dan kita terhubung dengan dunia fantasi Pangaea?! Dan sebagai pengembalian dengan satu-satunya kelas? Mari gores tiket lotere!

description.en: After his first drama flopped, Lee Hyunseok gave up on being a PD. But when he finds himself being granted one last wish in his dying moments, he wants only one thing: to produce the ultimate makjang drama. Now, he's been given a second shot at life (and the assistance of a ghostly PD), but he's on a time crunch to achieve ratings and recognition. With no budget, rookie actors, and an amateur writer, Hyunseok's got his work cut out for him. But what's a good drama without a few twists and turns?

高球王

description.en:
In Teirin High School, you are either part of a gang or an elite sports player. Sousuke Youki, called 'the predator,' is an undefeated master at fighting. One morning, as he finishes up a fight, Kazumi, a prodigy amateur golf player, took a look at Sousuke, ignored him, and walked right by. Infuriated, Sousuke sets out to get revenge on Kazumi for dissing him but Sousuke's revenge takes a detour as he gets himself involved in playing golf by the thuggish golf coach. Will this delinquent break legends and become "the King of Golf"?  
  
King Golf also won the 56th Shogakukan Manga Award in January 2010 in the boys category.

title.en: Kaji Daikou no Arubaito wo Hajimetara Gakuen Ichi no Bishoujo no Kazoku ni Kiniirarechaimashita

altTitles.ja: 家事代行のアルバイトを始めたら学園一の美少女の家族に気に入られちゃいました。

altTitles.en: I Started Working a Housekeeping Job and Ended up Being Liked by the Family of the Most Beautiful Girl in School

altTitles.pt-br: Comecei a trabalhar como empregado doméstico e acabei sendo apreciado pela família da garota mais bonita da escola

description.en:
My Part-Time Job is at the House of the Cutest Girl in School. A Shy and Awkward Housekeeping Rom-Com with the School Idol!

During his second year of high school, Haruto Otsuki starts a part-time job in housekeeping during the summer vacation. His first client turns out to be none other than Ayaka Tojo, the most beautiful girl in school! Despite being bewildered by this unexpected turn of events, Haruto continues doing his housekeeping duties. Over time, he becomes well-liked by Ayaka's family and begins regularly visiting her house.

From making home-cooked meals that delight Ayaka, to going grocery shopping together like a newlywed couple, and even going on shy movie dates like young lovers, they begin to grow closer by spending these special moments outside of school. This charming and awkward housekeeping rom-com featuring the most innocent and beautiful girl in school and a secretly high-spec guy begins!
description.id:
Pekerjaan Paruh Waktuku Ada di Rumah Gadis Termanis di Sekolah. Komedi Romantis Pemalu dan Canggung dengan Sang Idola Sekolah!
Selama tahun kedua sekolah menengahnya, Haruto Otsuki memulai pekerjaan paruh waktu sebagai pembantu rumah tangga selama liburan musim panas. Klien pertamanya ternyata tidak lain adalah Ayaka Tojo, gadis tercantik di sekolah! Meskipun bingung dengan kejadian tak terduga ini, Haruto terus melakukan tugas-tugas pembantu rumah tangganya. Seiring berjalannya waktu, ia menjadi disukai oleh keluarga Ayaka dan mulai mengunjungi rumahnya secara rutin.
Dari membuat makanan rumahan yang menyenangkan Ayaka, hingga pergi berbelanja kebutuhan sehari-hari bersama seperti pasangan pengantin baru, dan bahkan pergi menonton film malu-malu seperti sepasang kekasih muda, mereka mulai semakin dekat dengan menghabiskan momen-momen spesial ini di luar sekolah. Komedi romantis yang menawan dan canggung ini menampilkan gadis paling polos dan cantik di sekolah dan seorang pria yang diam-diam berkelas tinggi!
description.ja: 幼い頃に両親を亡くし、現在は祖母とふたりで暮らしている高校２年生・大槻晴翔は、自身の家事スキルを活かして夏休みに「家事代行サービス」の短期バイトを始める。しかしバイト初日に訪れた派遣先（豪邸）は偶然にも、学園一の美少女と名高い東條綾香の家だった。家事代行をする側とされる側、学校ではまったく交流のなかった二人が、不思議な関係で急接近ーー？
description.pt-br: Meu trabalho de meio período é na casa da garota mais fofa da escola. Uma comédia romântica tímida e estranha com a ídola da escola! Durante seu segundo ano do ensino médio, Haruto Otsuki começa um emprego de meio período como faxineiro durante as férias de verão. Seu primeiro cliente é ninguém menos que Ayaka Tojo, a garota mais linda da escola! Apesar de estar perplexo com esta reviravolta inesperada, Haruto continua fazendo suas tarefas domésticas. Com o tempo, ele se torna querido pela família de Ayaka e começa a visitar regularmente a casa dela. Desde preparar refeições caseiras que encantam Ayaka, até fazer compras juntos como um casal recém-casado, e até ir ao cinema tímidos como jovens amantes, eles começam a se aproximar passando esses momentos especiais fora da escola. Esta comédia romântica charmosa e desajeitada sobre tarefas domésticas, apresentando a garota mais inocente e bonita da escola e um cara secretamente de alta especificação, começa!

title.en: In This Life, the Greatest Star in the Universe

altTitles.en: I'm Going to Be a Big Star

description.en: Sun Woo-joo, an aspiring idol with shining talent, dedication, and passion, had only one shortcoming: "dancing." Having to give up on his lifelong dream of becoming an idol due to this one flaw, he was preparing for a different path in life when a miracle suddenly appeared! "I'll become a superstar brighter than anyone." His once lacking dance skills were no longer a problem. The UV Starship. Five perfectly prepared idols are finally ready with everything they need. A monstrous rookie is about to debut in the entertainment industry! Presenting 'The New Black.' This life, he's destined to be a cosmic superstar!

The person who is ranked No.1 in the world rankings of the AOS League of Infinity game and the strongest person who is nicknamed the devil on the battlefield.
However, a man wearing a golden mask appeared before the strongest person who had suffered a setback in a traffic accident and was abandoned by everyone and proposed.
“If I come back, can I become a world championship winner?”
The strongest person who goes back to the past becomes the maestro who leads the battlefield between earth and other worlds and shows the best game of all time.
description.id:
Orang yang merupakan peringkat No. 1 di peringkat dunia game AOS League of Infinity dan orang terkuat yang dijuluki iblis di medan perang.
Namun, seorang pria bertopeng emas muncul di hadapan orang terkuat yang mengalami kemerosotan dalam kecelakaan lalu lintas dan ditinggalkan oleh semua orang dan mengajukan lamaran.
“Jika saya kembali, bisakah saya menjadi pemenang kejuaraan dunia?”
Orang terkuat yang kembali ke masa lalu menjadi maestro yang memimpin medan perang antara bumi dan dunia lain dan menunjukkan permainan terbaik sepanjang masa.

altTitles.en: I Want to See You Embarrassed

altTitles.ja: 恥じらう君が見たいんだ

altTitles.th: เทคนี้ที่ผมถ่ายเป็นเรื่องน่าอายที่เธอไม่คัท

altTitles.zh-hk: 想看妳露出羞恥的模樣

description.en: Akito Shirasawa, a high school boy whose father is a film director, sees something in the library preparation room. It was the "masturbation scene" of his classmate, Kaho Honjou. Akito is puzzled, but ends up filming it with his smartphone. Kaho notices Akito, and in the men's restroom, makes a "proposal" to Akito! Exposed high school girl and movie boy. The "exposed love" of twisted adolescence, begins!
description.es-la: Akito Shirasawa, un chico de secundaria cuyo padre es director de cine, ve algo en la sala de preparación de la biblioteca. Era la "escena de la masturbación" de su compañera de clase, Natsuho Honjo. Akito está desconcertado, pero termina filmándolo con su teléfono inteligente. Natsuho nota a Akito, y en el baño de hombres, ¡le hace una "propuesta" a Akito! Chica de secundaria expuesta y chico de película. ¡Comienza el "amor expuesto" de la retorcida adolescencia!

altTitles.ja: 運命の巻戻士
All Great Achievements Require Time

description.en:
The world's most easy-to-understand and hot loop manga!

An organization that saves people who have tragically died, the Space-Time Police Special Task Force, also known as the "Rewind Officers"! Their weapon is the time machine "Retry Eye" embedded in their right eye! Rewind time dozens, hundreds, thousands of times until you solve the case! The first loop manga in CoroCoro's 45-year history, a must-see!
description.vi: Biệt đội cơ động cảnh sát thời không, hay còn gọi tắt là "Cảnh sát thời gian" (Người tua ngược/Rewinder) là một tổ chức giải cứu những người có cái chết bất đắc kì tử! Họ sử dụng một cỗ máy thời gian ở mắt phải "Retry Eye"! Những cảnh sát thời gian có thể quay ngược thời gian hàng chục, hàng trăm tới hàng nghìn lần cho đến khi phá được vụ án! Bộ truyện từng lập kỷ lục suốt 1 năm liền đứng đầu liên tục trong danh sát truyện yêu thích của tạp chí Corocoro Comic.

altTitles.ja: 娘の寝室

altTitles.vi: Phòng ngủ của con gái tôi

description.en: He had sex with his own daughter-though, of course, only in a dream. Goto, a university lecturer, had seemingly built a happy family: a beautiful wife who is a painter and lovely, talented children... But that happiness was merely a facade. During the day, he suspected his wife of infidelity, and at night, he was tormented by nightmares, gradually wearing down his mental stability. One day, Goto returned home to find his room in chaos and his daughter in tears. Convinced that his wife was to blame, Goto vows to protect his beloved family...!? A family suspense of immorality!
description.vi: Goto, một giảng viên đại học đang tận hưởng cuộc sống gia đình đầm ấm bên vợ mình là một nữ họa sĩ ăn khách xinh đẹp cùng hai người con. Nhưng rồi khi bắt đầu nảy sinh mối hiềm nghi vợ mình ngoại tình, cộng thêm bản thân đang bị một cơn ác mộng giày vò đã khiến tâm trí anh trở nên ngày càng suy sụp thấy rõ. Bỗng một ngày nọ khi vừa đi làm về, Goto phát hiện phòng ngủ của con gái mình bị ai đó phá tan hoang, và con gái anh đang ngồi khóc trên sàn. Tin rằng những hành động điên rồ này là chỉ có thể là do vợ làm ra, Goto liền quyết định sẽ đứng lên bảo vệ gia đình nhỏ của mình.

altTitles.ja: あくまであまい私の彼女

description.en:
Mai Amai --a girl who loves sweets-- got dumped by her girlfriend, and she's still grappling with the heartbreak. One day, the café she works at gets a new employee: The gorgeous Riri Kurosaki. Mai falls head over heels for her before realizing Riri is actually a succubus!

"I want to eat you and your parfaits right up! <3"
Thus starts a cute and trendy, but devilish, girls' romantic comedy!
description.ja: 甘いものが大好きな女の子・天井真衣は、付き合っていた彼女に振られて傷心中。ある日、勤務先のカフェの新人としてやってきた美少女・黒崎梨々に一目惚れをするも、なんと彼女は"サキュバス"という悪魔で……？パフェもあなたも食べちゃいたい♡ ポップでキュートな悪魔ティックガールズラブコメ、スタート！

description.en: The manga centers on a high school student who sends material to programs and a former child actor. The two team up to become an aspiring comedian duo.
description.ja: お笑いのセンスはあれど、人前では緊張してしまう内気な少年・四十万畦道！　かたやネタは作れずとも表現力はピカイチの元天才子役・東片太陽！　生きてきた道も違えば、性格も違う高校1年生の2人だが、目指す目標は唯一つ“お笑いの頂点”!!

altTitles.ja: 酔っぱらい盗賊、奴隷の少女を買う

altTitles.en: A Drunk Thief Bought a Slave Girl

altTitles.id: Thief Pemabuk yang Membeli Budak Gadis

altTitles.es-la: Un Ladrón Borracho que Compró una Esclava

description.en:
A hangover leads to a shared life between a thief and a slave girl.
 
Harris is an adventurer who works as a thief and scout, a job that is often shunned due to poor reputation.
 
One day he gets drunk and buys a slave girl, Tiana. Tiana, who had been treated badly and not given enough food until then, comes to adore Harris, who treats her kindly, as her master. Harris, who had been hoping that Tiana would grow up to be a beautiful woman, is gradually drawn to her because of her innocence.
 
Harris' life changes drastically when he begins living with Tiana: warm meals, freshly washed clothes, and interaction with the townspeople who had never come close to him before. On the other hand, he finds himself in more and more troublesome situations, will he manages to escape from them with his skill and tact...?
 
This is the story of the "rebirth" of a shabby thief, which begins with an encounter with a slave girl.

altTitles.ja: 賢者の孫

altTitles.th: หลานจอมปราชญ์

altTitles.vi: Con Đường Trở Thành Pháp Sư Đại Tài
Cháu trai của nhà thông thái

description.en:
Thanks to various magic, the human race has been saved from calamity many, many times. Retaining his memories from his previous life, a boy, Shin, was picked up by an old man known to the world as the "Magi." Shin was brought up by the Magi, who had retired to a secular place, as his own grandson. With the memories of his past life, he absorbed the Magi's craft and grew to be able to develop his own magic. Then, the grandfather told him he has to become independent when he reaches the age of 15.

"Ah, I forgot to teach him common sense."

The grandson who has grown beyond the level of normal people, lacked common sense; the common sense of the world. So to learn how to socialize, he goes to Earlshide Kingdom City to be admitted to Earlshide Advanced Magic Academy.
description.ja: 事故で死んだはずの青年が、赤ん坊の姿で異世界に転生。そして救国の英雄「賢者」マーリン・ウォルフォードに拾われた彼は、シンと名付けられる。孫として育てられたシンはマーリンから魔法を教わるが、その習得速度は驚くべきもので、メキメキと力をつけていく。一方、山奥で世間から隔離されて育った弊害として、シンには一つ致命的な問題があった…。そう、シンが１５歳となった時に祖父・マーリンは言ったのだ――「常識を教えるの忘れとった」！　かくして常識と友達を得るためアールスハイド高等魔法学院に入学するシンだったが――。

title.ja: Class Saiyasune de Urareta Ore wa, Jitsu wa Saikyou Parameter

altTitles.en: I Was Sold at the Lowest Price in My Class, However, My Personal Parameter Is the Most Powerful

altTitles.ja: クラス最安値で売られた俺は、実は最強パラメーター

altTitles.id: Aku Dijual dengan Harga Terendah di kelasku, namun Parameter Pribadiku adalah yang Paling Kuat

altTitles.zh-hk: 以全班最低價格賣出的我，實際上是最強

description.en:
Yuta, a boy transported to another world along with his classmates, finds himself in a realm where earthlings are summoned for their high inherent power. These powers are used to operate humanoid machines known as magic-machines through a special ability called Ludia that resides within humans.
However, Yuta’s Ludia value is shockingly low, with a reading of just 2. While his classmates are auctioned off at high prices, Yuta is sold at the lowest price and becomes a slave. But an encounter with the white magic-machine, Arleo, might just change his destiny.
From being an unwanted slave to becoming the strongest hero who shakes the world! The new era of Mecha Battle Entertainment has begun!
description.id:
Yuta, seorang anak laki-laki yang dikirim ke dunia lain bersama teman-teman sekelasnya.

Ini memanggil dan menggunakan penduduk bumi yang cenderung memiliki nilai tinggi di dunia yang berbeda di mana mesin humanoid yang disebut "mesin sihir" dioperasikan dengan kekuatan khusus "Ludia" yang terdapat pada manusia. 

Nilai Ludia Yuta hanya "2" sementara banyak teman yang membeli dengan harga tinggi. Yuta dibeli dengan "harga terendah" dan diubah menjadi budak, tetapi pertemuan dengan mesin sihir putih "Arleo" membangunkannya menjadi pria yang kuat--!?

Dari budak dengan harga terendah di kelasnya, dunia baru Mecha Battle Entertainment telah mulai menjadi pahlawan terkuat yang mengguncang dunia!
description.es-la: Durante el viaje escolar, el autobús de la clase 3 de segundo año con 32 personas fue convocado a otro mundo... íbamos a ser vendidos para convertirnos en pilotos de robots como armas mágicas, pero parece que los valores de los precios de venta son decididos por algún tipo de parámetro desconocido llamado Ludia .Mientras algunos compañeros obtuvieron precios altos con parámetros de 10,000 o 20,000, mis parámetros eran en realidad 2... realmente increíble, pero en realidad el valor de mi parámetro hizo que la aguja de la maquina de medición realizara una vuelta completa, pero nadie lo notó... aunque tenia los parámetros más fuertes... nadie me compro y, de hecho, me cambiaron como esclavo por dos frutas

title.en: I Became the Youngest Member of Top Idol

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Retorno Como O Membro Mais Jovem

description.en: “25…that’s too old to become an idol.” Do Seohan, who got eliminated from the successful idol survival audition program ‘Stardust Project’. Giving up his dreams, he is trying to find his way working part-time jobs. When all of a sudden, he wakes up 8 years in the past after an accident. Right before the ‘Stardust Project’ started! As the youngest (but most experienced), can he make it to the final lineup this time?
description.id: Do Seohan, yang gagal dalam idol survival show terkenal “Stardust Project”, selalu dibayang-bayangi oleh mimpi masa lalunya. Tak pernah meraih kesuksesan, Seohan hanya bisa bekerja sambilan untuk melewati hari-harinya. Namun, akibat sebuah kejadian yang menimpanya, tiba-tiba ia terbangun dan kembali ke 8 tahun lalu, tepat sebelum “Stardust Project” dimulai! Jiwanya 8 tahun lebih tua dari kontestan lainnya, tapi sekarang ia yang termuda di antara mereka. Apakah kali ini Seohan akan berhasil debut sebagai idol?
description.ko:
"25살…그거 아이돌은 못하는 나이잖아요."
유명 서바이벌 아이돌 오디션 '스타더스트 프로젝트'에서 탈락했던 도서한.
꿈에 미련은 못버리고 현실과 타협한 채 알바를 전전하는데…눈을 떠보니 8년 전으로 돌아왔다.
그것도 '스타더스트 프로젝트'를 시작하기 직전으로!
막내가 된 (영혼만은) 최고 연장자, 이번에는 오디션에 합격해 아이돌 멤버가 될 수 있을까?
description.pt-br: Do Seohan, que fracassou no famoso programa de sobrevivência de idols "Stardust Project", é sempre assombrado por seus sonhos do passado. Sem nunca ter alcançado o sucesso, Seohan só consegue trabalhar em empregos de meio período para passar seus dias. No entanto, devido a um incidente que lhe aconteceu, ele acordou de repente e voltou a 8 anos atrás, logo antes do início do "Stardust Project"! Sua alma é 8 anos mais velha que a dos outros participantes, mas agora ele é o mais jovem entre eles. Será que Seohan conseguirá debutar como idol desta vez?

description.en:
Tang Ran is a bright and cheerful little fox spirit. To graduate from the Monster Academy, she transforms into a human college student hoping to seduce a human and make them fall in love with her. However, little does she know that the reserved human female professor she has a crush on, Su Qingci, is actually a…

One lie leads to another. To make the other person fall in love with them first, the fox must spin an endless web of “lies.”

altTitles.en: I Become a Fool When It Comes to My Daughter

altTitles.ja: 今日も娘が可愛すぎます

description.en:
I've become a single father!

24-year-old Juwon Lee works part-time at a convenience store and lives alone in his small apartment. One day his uncle passes away and leaves behind a 4-year-old daughter, the cute little Yeondu. Instead of letting her be sent to an orphanage, Juwon steps up and decides to be her new guardian.

title.en: Together With the Gods of Music

description.en:
A producer who had no talent but wanted to make it as a singer.
Death came on what he thought was his last chance, but the music gods didn't turn their backs on him.

-If the music gods don't abandon you, can you really do it?

With the gods of music, change began.
description.ko:
재능은 없지만 가수로 성공하고 싶었던 프로듀서.
마지막 기회라고 생각했던 날 찾아온 죽음, 그러나 음악의 신들은 그를 외면하지 않았다.

-음악의 신들이 너를 버리지 않는다면, 정말 할 수 있겠나?

음악의 신들과 함께 변화는 시작되었다.

altTitles.vi: Bị Che Khuất Bởi Ánh Mặt Trời Lặn
Tà dương trong đôi mắt vô hồn

altTitles.ru: Закат, отражённый в её ледяном взгляде

description.en:
The witch Hildegar, who received the blessing of the Sun Goddess Karia, is known far and wide for her fearsome reputation.  
The Northerner Elkin, who lost his homeland, chases after the witch towards a nameless castle…
description.ko:
태양의 신 카리야의 가호를 받은 마녀 '힐데가르'.
고향을 잃은 북부인 '에르킨'은 마녀를 쫓아 이름 없는 성으로 향한다.

altTitles.ja: アーク〜フリーター人生に終止符を〜

description.en:
Hyunwoo, an unemployed part-timer worker, is struggling with his everyday life. With his only strong suit being gaming, he struggles to be employed and getting a job at a major company seems like a dream that'll never come true.

However, one day he receives an opportunity to turn his life around! A job interview at the largest virtual reality game developer ever, Global Exus, is through a game?! With his father's absence since childhood, his ill mother, and their severe poverty; this seems like an opportunity of of a lifetime.

Armed only with his tough nature, Hyunwoo enters <New World> and begins his conquest!

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%84%ED%81%AC/2391)

description.ja:
就職活動どころか生活難に苦しみながら、日々の暮らしに追われる晩年フリーターの翔太。 他人と比べ自信があるのは、ゲームしかない彼にとって大企業への就職は無縁だった。 しかし突然やって来た人生逆転のチャンス！ 大企業の入社面接が仮想現実ゲーム!?父親の不在、病気の母親、貧困… 根性だけが取り柄である翔太の仮想現実ゲーム＜ニューワールド＞征服期が始まる！

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%84%ED%81%AC/2391)

description.ko:
취업준비는커녕 생활고에 시달리며, 
하루하루 살기 급급한 만년 알바생 현우. 

그나마 남들보다 잘하는 건 게임밖에 없는 그에게 있어, 
대기업 취직은 딴 세상 이야기였다...

갑작스럽게 찾아온 인생역전의 기회! 
대기업 입사 면접이 가상현실게임이라고?!

아버지의 부재, 병든 어머니.. 지독한 가난. 

남은 건 악바리 근성밖에 없는 현우의 가상현실게임 <뉴월드>정복기가 시작된다!

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%84%ED%81%AC/2391)

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/12947)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60137)
description.ru:
Хён Ву - обычный безработный, прожигающий свою жизнь в видеоиграх. Из-за того, что его единственная сильная сторона это игры, он  мечтает устроиться на работу в крупную компанию. Ему кажется, что эта мечта несбыточная, однако он всё же получает шанс изменить свою жизнь. Собеседование в "Global Exus" пройдёт в виде экзамена в игре?! У него с детства не было отца, сейчас его мать тяжело больна, и они на грани бедности, это возможность изменить всю его жизнь. Вооружённый лишь своей жёсткой натурой, Хён Ву приходит в "Новый Мир", чтобы завоевать его!

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%84%ED%81%AC/2391)

description.zh:
面试，是一件很恐怖的事情。去全球五百强的企业面试，更是地狱难度。他，为了摆脱生活的窘迫，挣脱贫穷的枷锁，鼓足了勇气来到了这家企业，却被告之面试内容就是玩游戏？！而这款游戏的要求只有一个，就是“不择手段的活下去！”

altTitles.en: Bloodborne - Lady Maria and The Old Hunters

altTitles.ru: Порождение крови - Леди Мария и старые охотники

altTitles.ar: بلودبورن - السيدة ماريا و قدماء الصيادين

description.en: The tale of Lady Maria becoming a hunter who hunts the beasts that terrorizes the city of Yharnam.
description.ru: Это история о Леди Марии – одной из первых учениц Германа, кто закончит свой путь в кошмаре охотника. Нам предстоит вернутся в самое начало и проследить становление этого персонажа, а заодно увидеть, как Ярнам погрузится в пучину раздора и безумия. Данная веб манга основана на событиях игры Bloodborne.

title.en: Sensei to Seito wa, Ai wo Shiranai.

altTitles.ja: 先生と生徒は、愛を知らない。

altTitles.ja-ro: Sensei to Seito wa, Ai wo Shiranai.

description.vi: Người mà tôi yêu thương nhất trên đời hóa ra không hề yêu thương tôi. Tôi lúc này đây không còn cách nào khác ngoài căm ghét chính người ấy. Đây là một câu chuyện giữa hai con người không biết yêu dần thu hút lẫn nhau.

altTitles.en: How to Live as a Fake Healer

altTitles.th: ฮีลเลอร์กำมะลอ

description.en:
One day, Seunghyeon Kang woke up to find himself in an unfamiliar world, on the continent of Azeul. At that moment, a status window pops up: 

[Your class is Healer?]

Wait, but he doesn’t have a single healing skill?! 

And so begins the life of a quack Healer who can’t cast Heal as he struggles to find a way back to his home!

title.en: Jibun dewa Cool na Tsumori no Inu Maid-san

altTitles.ja: 自分ではクールなつもりの犬メイドさん

altTitles.ja-ro: Jibun de wa Cool na Tsumori no Inu Maid-san

altTitles.en: A Dog Maid Who Thinks She's Being Cool

altTitles.ja: R15＋じゃダメですか？

description.en: What should I do to become an adult? Akane Amou, who grew up with her parents forbidding any kind of entertainment, is a little bad with "stimulating" stuff, to the point she can't even watch a kissing scene in a drama. Now that she’s a highschool student, she somehow wants to overcome it! Those are her intentions, but it’s not that easy. Meanwhile, she got acquainted with a movie otaku named Fuyumine. Will she be able to watch an R15 movie…?
description.ja:
大人になるって、どうすればいいの？　親からすべての娯楽を禁止されて育った天羽秋音は、ドラマのキスシーンも観れないくらい、”刺激的”なものが少し苦手。高校生にもなったんだから、なんとか克服したい！　と意気込むが、なかなか道は険しい。そんな中、映画オタクの冬峰と知り合い、15禁映画を観ることになり…⁉
 
--- 
 
Otona ni naru tte, dōsureba ī no? Oya kara subete no goraku o kinshi sa rete sodatta Amou aki-on wa, dorama no kisushīn mo mi renai kurai, ”shigeki-teki” na mono ga sukoshi nigate. Kōkōsei ni mo natta ndakara, nantoka kokufuku shitai! To ikigomu ga, nakanaka michi wa kewashī. Son'na Chū, eiga otaku no fuyu-hō to shiriai, 15 kin eiga o miru koto ni nari...!?
description.vi:
"Mình sẽ làm gì để trở thành người lớn?"
Akane Amo, lớn lên trong sự bảo bọc nghiêm khắc của cha mẹ mà không tiếp xúc với phương tiện giải trí, bước qua tuổi 15, trước những thứ "tình cảm", thậm chí là một nụ hôn cũng không thể xem được.
Giờ đã vào trường cấp ba, cùng với cậu bạn Fuyumine, Amo sẽ bước qua những rào cản ấy. Liệu cô bé có thể xem được một phim nhán mác "cấm trẻ em"?
description.pt-br:
O que devo fazer para me tornar uma adulta?

Akane Amou, que cresceu com seus pais proibindo qualquer tipo de entretenimento, é um pouco ruim com coisas "estimulantes", até o ponto de não conseguir assistir a uma cena de beijo em um drama. Agora que ela é estudante do ensino médio, ela quer de alguma forma superá-lo! Essas são suas intenções, mas não é tão fácil. Enquanto isso, ela se familiarizou com um filme otaku chamado Fuyumine. Será que ela será capaz de assistir um filme R15...?

title.en: Gal no Haigo ni Rei ga Iru

altTitles.en: There's a Ghost Behind the Gyaru

altTitles.ja: ギャルの背後に霊がいる

altTitles.en: The ghost is behind the gal

description.en: A girl notices something lurking behind her friend.

title.en: I Think I Have Transmigrated Somewhere

altTitles.ko: 제가 어딘가 빙의를 한 것 같은데요.

altTitles.en: I Have Possessed the Body of the Protagonist
I Think I've Been Possessed Somewhere

altTitles.es-la: Creo que he transmigrado en alguna novela

description.en:
Even though the harsh reality feels like living as a beggar, to think that the end would be death from overworking!
If it’s going to end like this, I should’ve been in a lot of relationships, but wait,
oh my... who are you in the mirror?

I’m a little flustered but this body… it’s really pretty!
It feels like I’ve been transmigrated into a romance fantasy novel.
Since I’m already like this, should I enjoy the romance while I’m at it?

“But which novel did I get transmigrated into?”

I’ve read dozens of books where the ‘Northern Duke’ and ‘Childhood Friends’ exist,
I’ve read so many with a black-haired male lead and a blonde female lead,
Ah~ I don’t know!! For now, let’s start by conquering the male characters!

“I already have a promised marriage."

“I volunteered for the Western Guard. We won’t be able to meet for several years.”
What is this, is this really a romance fantasy novel? Why is everyone running away?!
In the first place… was I really transmigrated as the female lead?

What kind of novel is this!!!!
<It Seems I’ve Transmigrated Somewhere>
description.pl:
Uwielbiam powieści romantyczno-fantastyczne, a nawet trafiłam do jednej z nich.
"W każdym razie, do której książki się przeniosłam?"
Myślę, że przeczytałam około 20 książek z brązowowłosymi pokojówkami z piegami,
Myślę, że przeczytałem około 20 książek z południową damą, która poślubia zimnego księcia z północy,
I wydaje się, że jest więcej książek z czarnowłosymi mężczyznami i blondynkami?
"Czekaj, czy to w ogóle prawda, że zmieniłam się w główną bohaterką?"
Nie, myślę, że to może nawet nie być romans fantasy?

altTitles.ja: 怪奇人形館

description.en:
Kaiki Ningyou-kan's first appearance was in Shoujo Friend Zoukan: Suspense & Horror #1, 1992

This volume collect 6 horror stories by Kanako inuki, the first 4 all being about dolls.

- **Playing with Dolls** - O Ningyou Asobi (お人形遊び)
- **Mannequin** - (マネキン)
- **Blue Eyed Marie** - Aoi me no Mari (青い目のマリー)
- **Ventriloquist's Love** - Fukuwajutsushi to Koi (腹話術師と恋)
- **Ritual** - Gikishi (儀式)
Shoujo Friend Zoukan: Suspense & Horror #1, 1991
- **I Can Fulfill Your Love Wishes** - Koi no Negai Kanaemasu (恋の願いかなえます)
Shoujo Friend #6, 1990
description.ja: 人形にだって心があって生きている。ホラーからハートフルまで、人形をめぐる様々な物語「お人形遊び」「マネキン」「青い目のマリー」「腹話術師の恋」。仲良し４人組が自分の友情の確認のために悪魔へ約束の誓いをしてしまう「儀式」。学校で影が薄い山田みすずは恋の悩みで占いの館に寄る。そこで自分を変える手段を見つけたみすずが最後に選んだ道は…「恋の願いかなえます」。犬木可奈子の至極のオムニバスホラー群。

altTitles.ja: ウィンドブレイカー

description.en: Haruka Sakura wants nothing to do with weaklings—he's only interested in the strongest of the strong. He's just started at Furin High School, a school of degenerates known only for their brawling strength—strength they use to protect their town from anyone who wishes it ill. But Haruka's not interested in being a hero or being part of any sort of team—he just wants to fight his way to the top!
description.fr:
Haruka Sakura est le genre de lycéen qui fait passer la baston avant les révisions. Fraîchement débarqué en ville, c'est donc le sourire aux lèvres qu'il compte pousser les portes du lycée Fûrin, l'établissement scolaire au pire taux de délinquance du pays... Les intentions de Haruka sont claires : se mesurer aux meilleurs bagarreurs de ce bahut et devenir le meilleur de tous ! Mais entre-temps, il se retrouve mêlé à une altercation avec une bande de brutes dans un des quartiers de la ville, avant d'être sauvé in extremis par des élèves de son lycée. Haruka réalise alors à quel genre de phénomènes il risque d'avoir affaire...

Maison d'édition FR : Pika
description.ja: 彼らは、最強の不良軍団。そして、街の英雄───。偏差値は最底辺、喧嘩は最強。超不良校として名高い学校・風鈴（ふうりん）高校。この春、そんな風鈴のトップを目指して街にやってきた風鈴高校１年生・桜遥（さくらはるか）は、風鈴高校が“防風鈴（ボウフウリン）”と名付けられた街を守る集団となっていたことを知る。そして桜は、風鈴の一員として街を守るため戦い始めることに──！　不良高校生・桜の喧嘩英雄伝説、開幕!!
description.pt-br: A Fûrin High School ganhou a pior reputação entre as escolas da região por ter a média mais baixa e os alunos mais rebeldes. E nela ingressa Haruka Sakura, um jovem que acaba de chegar na cidade, que busca ser o mais forte para poder proteger todos com quem se importa. Para atingir seu objetivo, porém, a primeira coisa que ele deve fazer é se juntar a uma gangue chamada Wind Breaker, que representa seu instituto e cujo objetivo é defender a cidade de outras gangues e bandidos. No entanto, para que eles o aceitem, ele terá que ganhar o respeito deles com os punhos!

description.en: An experimental amateur web manga about world where after Aza event, 88 percent of the world turned into medieval world. Principality of Prince Akihiko and his girlfriend, Princess Avakorea didn't got effect. Meanwhile Akihiko's other girlfriend's Principality got turned.
